headline: What PTC (PTC)'s Regulatory-Focused CAD Integration With Enlil Means For Shareholders
summary: In the past week, Enlil Inc. announced new integrations with PTC Onshape, Dassault Systèmes SolidWorks, and Bill.com, enhancing connectivity for medical device development and regulatory compliance by streamlining financial and mechanical CAD workflows on its platform. This integration highlights industry demand for regulatory-focused, interoperable solutions, positioning PTC Onshape as a critical component in cross-functional product lifecycle management for heavily regulated sectors. Next,...

headline: PTC to Announce Fourth Fiscal Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results on Wednesday, November 5th, 2025
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) will release its fiscal 2025 fourth quarter and full year results on Wednesday, November 5th after the stock market closes. Senior management will host a live webcast and conference call to review the results on Wednesday, November 5th at 5pm Eastern Time. The earnings press release, accompanying earnings presentation, and financial data tables will be accessible prior to the conference call and webcast on the Investor Relations section of the Company's website at PTC Investor
